SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: UPDATE b_rel_product SET P_Relevant_ID=@@P_Relevant_ID@@% <%=,Source_Product_ID=@@Source_Product_ID@@%>,<%=,Rel_Product_ID=@@Rel_Product_ID@@%>,<%=,P_Relevant_Status=@@P_Relevant_Status@@%>,<%=,P_Relevant_Seq=@@P_Relevant_Seq@@%>,<%=,Create_Time=@@Create_Time@@%>,<%=,Create_UserId=@@Create_UserId@@%>,<%=,Create_User=@@Create_User@@%>,<%=,Update_Time=@@Update_Time@@%>,<%=,Update_UserId=@@Update_UserId@@%>,<%=,Update_User=@@Update_User@@%> WHERE P_Relevant_ID=@@P_Relevant_ID@@%;

SELECT P_Relevant_ID,Source_Product_ID,Rel_Product_ID,P_Relevant_Status,P_Relevant_Seq,Create_Time,Create_UserId,Create_User,Update_Time,Update_UserId,Update_User FROM b_rel_product WHERE 1=1 <%= AND P_Relevant_ID=@@P_Relevant_ID@@%> <%= AND Source_Product_ID=@@Source_Product_ID@@%> <%= AND Rel_Product_ID=@@Rel_Product_ID@@%> <%= AND P_Relevant_Status=@@P_Relevant_Status@@%> <%= AND P_Relevant_Seq=@@P_Relevant_Seq@@%> <%= AND Create_Time=@@Create_Time@@%> <%= AND Create_UserId=@@Create_UserId@@%> <%= AND Create_User=@@Create_User@@%> <%= AND Update_Time=@@Update_Time@@%> <%= AND Update_UserId=@@Update_UserId@@%> <%= AND Update_User=@@Update_User@@%>;

SELECT P_Relevant_ID,Source_Product_ID,Rel_Product_ID,P_Relevant_Status,P_Relevant_Seq,Create_Time,Create_UserId,Create_User,Update_Time,Update_UserId,Update_User FROM b_rel_product WHERE 1=1 <%= AND P_Relevant_ID=@@P_Relevant_ID@@%> <%= AND Source_Product_ID=@@Source_Product_ID@@%> <%= AND Rel_Product_ID=@@Rel_Product_ID@@%> <%= AND P_Relevant_Status=@@P_Relevant_Status@@%> <%= AND P_Relevant_Seq=@@P_Relevant_Seq@@%> <%= AND Create_Time=@@Create_Time@@%> <%= AND Create_UserId=@@Create_UserId@@%> <%= AND Create_User=@@Create_User@@%> <%= AND Update_Time=@@Update_Time@@%> <%= AND Update_UserId=@@Update_UserId@@%> <%= AND Update_User=@@Update_User@@%> LIMIT <R%= @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ; SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM b_rel_product WHERE 1=1 <%= AND P_Relevant_ID=@@P_Relevant_ID@@%> <%= AND Source_Product_ID=@@Source_Product_ID@@%> <%= AND Rel_Product_ID=@@Rel_Product_ID@@%> <%= AND P_Relevant_Status=@@P_Relevant_Status@@%> <%= AND P_Relevant_Seq=@@P_Relevant_Seq@@%> <%= AND Create_Time=@@Create_Time@@%> <%= AND Create_UserId=@@Create_UserId@@%> <%= AND Create_User=@@Create_User@@%> <%= AND Update_Time=@@Update_Time@@%> <%= AND Update_UserId=@@Update_UserId@@%> <%= AND Update_User=@@Update_User@@%>;
